channel.title: CVE Feed for rayhanduitku -- Duitku Payment Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rayhanduitku -- Duitku Payment Gateway

item.title: CVE-2024-0631|2024-03-13T15:27:07.880Z -- rayhanduitku -- Duitku Payment Gateway
item.description: The Duitku Payment Gateway plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the check_duitku_response function in all versions up to, and including, 2.11.4. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change the payment status of orders to failed.
